articles.author: Sonia Rao
articles.title: Ken Burns says Americans have been fighting each other since the beginning - The Washington Post
articles.description: In his new documentary series “The American Revolution,” the prolific filmmaker depicts a nation created by violence. Still, he finds cause for optimism.
articles.content: Theres a neon sign in Ken Burnss editing room that reads, Its complicated. Even the prolific documentarian, who spends more time than most exploring the difficulttruths of our nations history, needs … [+261 chars]

articles.author: Casey DelBasso
articles.title: Apple launches new iPhone Pocket knit case designed by Issey Miyake - Good Morning America
articles.description: Apple's new accessory offers a stylish way to carry your iPhone.
articles.content:
Apple has introduced a new way to carry your iPhone with the launch of the iPhone Pocket.
The new accessory is a 3D-knitted carry case designed in collaboration with Japanese designer Issey Miyake.… [+950 chars]
